      static java.lang.String Changesyntax​(Polynom Poly)
      we take julien function and, because his print function that gets string is not the same like ours. we crate a new function that adjust our string to be like his

      In this function we find the max point and the min point, and save all of them in array list by using julien point class.

    • Method Detail

      • Changesyntax

        public static java.lang.String Changesyntax​(Polynom Poly)
        we take julien function and, because his print function that gets string is not the same like ours. we crate a new function that adjust our string to be like his. "0.2x^4-1.5x^3+3.0x^2-x-5"----> "0.2*X^4+(0-1.5)*X^3+3.0*X^2+(0-1.0)*X^1+(0-5.0)"

      • foundMinMax

        public static java.util.ArrayList<fr.julien.graphique.element.point.Point> foundMinMax​(Polynom p,
                                                                                       double x2,
                                                                                       double x3,
                                                                                       double eps)
        In this function we find the max point and the min point, and save all of them in array list by using julien point class.

      • print

        public static void print​(Polynom p,
                         double x0,
                         double x1)
        Here we use Julien function to print the graph, and we marked in the graph the maximum and minimum points. we use Changesyntax and foundMinMax function to adjust the graph to ours printing.
